author: kurdalen
msg: a few more test stubs and fixed test suite

author: jdcasey
msg: [MNG-4137] Initialize configInterpolator in case a custom component descriptor is provided for the lifecycle manager which doesn't wire in this field. This behavior is the same as that done for the modelInterpolator field, both of which cause NPE's in Hudson.

author: jdcasey
msg: [MNG-4146] Use standard component descriptor for SecDispatcher component, brought in by plexus-sec-dispatcher, instead of the replicated one in maven-core. The replicated version was missing the requirement for the decryptors map.

author: jdcasey
msg: [MNG-4147] Use the httpclient-based http wagon instead of http-lightweight in order to avoid long-password Base64 problems in the HTTPURLConnection implementation from Sun.

author: astitcher
msg: Removed code that prevents cmake build from raw checkout
